text: Bibhuti Roy is a professor. He works at the University of Bremen and is a visiting professor at international universities. == Life == Roy was born in East Pakistan. He has a Bachelor of Science and received his Ph.D. in engineering after completing a doctoral dissertation, titled "Simulation as an action-oriented learning medium in professional education".http://dip21.bundestag.de/dip21/btd/18/107/1810780.pdf Roy began his career in Bremen. He was the vice head of department of the Institute Technology and Education (ITB). == References == Category:Living people Category:Articles with hCards
title: Bibhuti Roy
